name: Embody Aspect
description: When this pokemon terastalizes, it embodies the pure aspects of its mask.
effect:
This ability is gained when Ogerpon Terastalizes. It gains a boost depending on it's held mask:
- Teal Mask: +1 Dex
- Wellspring Mask: +1 SpDef
- Hearthflame Mask: +1 Strength
- Cornerstone Mask: +1 Defense
